summary: When Callie discovers that her father has had a debilitating stroke, she sees it as the perfect opportunity to return home and seek justice for her mother.
cast: Elizabeth Gillies|Cynthia Stevenson|William R. Moses|Sebastian Pigott|Tori Anderson|Tom Barnett|Sabrina Mangiaracina|Jennilee Murray|Luigi Saracino|Dean Hagopian|Michelle Treacy|Amanda Jordan|Karl Claude|Matthew Stefiuk|Mohi Awal|Stephanie Bauder|Helena-Alexis Seymour|Jeff Lawson|Cassandre Mentor|Barry Blake|Robert Crampton|Vanessa Fournier|Julia A. Long|Alan Lummiss|Sarah McArdle|Simon Seline|Roger Wehbe
director: Director: Curtis Crawford (as Curtis James Crawford)
title: Killing Daddy
